Registering Online

You can register your copy of Serena ChangeMan Version Manager online during installation, and from the desktop client. Online registration provides the following benefits:

  • Activates your technical support account, allowing us to more efficiently assist you if you need to contact us.
  • Allows you to subscribe to Via-E, our monthly email newsletter on the latest Serena product developments.
  • Provides a brief overview of the online resources you can access from the Serena web site, including technology partner sites, and live chat sessions.

When you choose to register online, a registration webpage automatically appears in your default HTML browser.

To register Version Manager online:

  1. Select Help | Register Now. The registration webpage automatically appears in your default web browser.

  2. Complete the registration webpage.
